00011 // emission.cpp*
00012 #include "volume.h"
00013 #include "transport.h"
00014 #include "scene.h"
00015 // EmissionIntegrator Declarations
00016 class EmissionIntegrator : public VolumeIntegrator {
00017 public:
00018         // EmissionIntegrator Public Methods
00019         EmissionIntegrator(float ss) { stepSize = ss; }
00020         void RequestSamples(Sample *sample, const Scene *scene);
00021         Spectrum Transmittance(const Scene *, const Ray &ray, const Sample *sample, float *alpha) const;
00022         Spectrum Li(const Scene *, const RayDifferential &ray, const Sample *sample, float *alpha) const;
00023 private:
00024         // EmissionIntegrator Private Data
00025         float stepSize;
00026         int tauSampleOffset, scatterSampleOffset;
00027 };
00028 // EmissionIntegrator Method Definitions
00029 void EmissionIntegrator::RequestSamples(Sample *sample,
00030                 const Scene *scene) {
00031         tauSampleOffset = sample->Add1D(1);
00032         scatterSampleOffset = sample->Add1D(1);
00033 }
00034 Spectrum
00035         EmissionIntegrator::Transmittance(const Scene *scene,
00036                 const Ray &ray, const Sample *sample,
00037                 float *alpha) const {
00038         if (!scene->volumeRegion) return Spectrum(1.f);
00039         float step = sample ? stepSize : 4.f * stepSize;
00040         float offset =
00041                 sample ? sample->oneD[tauSampleOffset][0] :
00042                 RandomFloat();
00043         Spectrum tau =
00044                 scene->volumeRegion->Tau(ray, step, offset);
00045         return Exp(-tau);
00046 }
00047 Spectrum EmissionIntegrator::Li(const Scene *scene,
00048                 const RayDifferential &ray, const Sample *sample,
00049                 float *alpha) const {
00050         VolumeRegion *vr = scene->volumeRegion;
00051         float t0, t1;
00052         if (!vr || !vr->IntersectP(ray, &t0, &t1)) return 0.f;
00053         // Do emission-only volume integration in _vr_
00054         Spectrum Lv(0.);
00055         // Prepare for volume integration stepping
00056         int N = Ceil2Int((t1-t0) / stepSize);
00057         float step = (t1 - t0) / N;
00058         Spectrum Tr(1.f);
00059         Point p = ray(t0), pPrev;
00060         Vector w = -ray.d;
00061         if (sample)
00062                 t0 += sample->oneD[scatterSampleOffset][0] * step;
00063         else
00064                 t0 += RandomFloat() * step;
00065         for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i, t0 += step) {
00066                 // Advance to sample at _t0_ and update _T_
00067                 pPrev = p;
00068                 p = ray(t0);
00069                 Spectrum stepTau = vr->Tau(Ray(pPrev, p - pPrev, 0, 1),
00070                         .5f * stepSize, RandomFloat());
00071                 Tr *= Exp(-stepTau);
00072                 // Possibly terminate raymarching if transmittance is small
00073                 if (Tr.y() < 1e-3) {
00074                         const float continueProb = .5f;
00075                         if (RandomFloat() > continueProb) break;
00076                         Tr /= continueProb;
00077                 }
00078                 // Compute emission-only source term at _p_
00079                 Lv += Tr * vr->Lve(p, w);
00080         }
00081         return Lv * step;
00082 }
00083 extern "C" DLLEXPORT VolumeIntegrator *CreateVolumeIntegrator(const ParamSet &params) {
00084         float stepSize  = params.FindOneFloat("stepsize", 1.f);
00085         return new EmissionIntegrator(stepSize);
00086 }
